char_info.char_desc: The Plant Whose Hair Never Stops Growing

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What has happened here? Did an experiment by a youkai-born go disastrously wrong or something?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It left my hair excessively long. It's unpleasant and I'm not the tengu everybody knows.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It's impossible to cut it off. Where can I find a cure for this?
There is no cure for whatever you're talking about.
If you try finding one, you'll give up before you even try.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Give up? This long hair thing is totally unacceptable.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I look like a freak who just crawled out of the remains of Chernobyl.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I shall not be this way!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But you need to be like this. Hair is the essence of beauty.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My dog is growling at me. How can I live in this godawful condition?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There are no problems to worry about.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Every person I try to talk to flees in terror when they see me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I write for The Daily Bunbunmaru.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm not hostile to humanoids, but listen to me, you person with overgrown hair!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My overgrown hair has made me beautiful. No need for insults!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if you're beautiful now, Queen Marisa or Yukari will still beat you. Mind if I do it to you?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Battling me won't make any difference, even if you make my hair fall out!
